Topic.Title: Some very good videos for game designers, especially new ones

Posts.EditableText:
The guys at Extra Credits have a wonderful series of videos on game design, becoming a game designer, and so on. Their channel is here:

https://www.youtube.com/user/ExtraCreditz

I highly recommend every game designer - newbie on up - go watch them.
